channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: One Tech Tip: How to get the most life out of your device
item.description: If you want to use your shiny new iPhone for as long as possible, better take good care of it. People want to hold on to their smartphones for longer now instead of regularly upgrading them.

item.title: Harris, Walz will sit down for first major television interview of their presidential campaign
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris and her running mate, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, will sit down for their first major television interview of their presidential campaign, as the duo travels in southeast Georgia on a bus tour.

item.title: Florida to execute man convicted of 1994 killing of college student in national forest
item.description: A Florida man is scheduled to be put to death by lethal injection 30 years after he killed a college freshman and raped the victimâ€™s older sister while the siblings were camping in a national forest.
